title: Free NA -> Oceania Transfer Window Now Open (Until Feb 8th)
body:
Happy Friday Oceania!!

We're going to open the free transfer window from North America to Oceania for 2 weeks! The free window will open on January 23, 2015 and run through February 8, 2015. After that time it will go back to the regular price of 2,600 RP.

To transfer your account:

* Log into your North American account
* Click on the store icon up the top
* Unlock the Transfer to Oceania when it is free from January 23 through February 8

You can find out more information about the transfer process here: [http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-transfer-faq](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-transfer-faq)

EDIT: If you've paid for a transfer from NA to OCE between Jan 2nd and 23rd we will be automatically refunding the RP cost to your account by the 26th at the earliest. You may also contact player support if you'd like to receive the refund sooner, although it may still take a day or two: [https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)

replies.body:
I have accounts on both NA and OCE.
I can say that playing with 30 ping on OCE and 250 ping on NA is a huge difference.

Dear Riot, when will you allow transfers from OCE to NA?

I'm sure there are more aussies willing to server swap to NA than Americans to our server.
So if you don't mind... :L


Think Riot is scared that we'll all just leave due to toxicity.

It's the same strategy as with WoW realm transfers or whatever - you don't give free transfers to a bigger server. OCE struggles to maintain its queues due to a lack of players, letting people transfer to NA for free would make the experience worse for everyone on OCE while doing nothing to improve NA.

Moreover, I don't even agree that toxicity is higher in OCE. The grass is always greener on the other side. Toxicity exists on all servers, it's the nature of the game. Sure, I can agree that people on OCE are more vulgar in terms of their choice of words, but I've had far more negative experiences on NA than on OCE personally.
Shouldn't this be stickied?
Yes, yes it should. Glad you had my back!

why is it posted to the OCE boards? not bothered to check NA, but really...why here? "hey OCe people! you can transfer your NA account to OCE....well, if you have any other ones than the one you are using to view this..."

seems kind of redundant.
People will see it here and tell their irl friends "hey you know that NA account you put so much into? You can transfer it to OCE for free soon and play soulstealer draven @ 50 ping"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wcz4u3Lv9ko

This is gonna have a detrimental effect on the OCE community. 
We dont need Americ**ts who have been putting up with NA lag thinking that with this free transfer they will be getting better ping. 

Whats gonna end up happening is they come here expecting better connection, start playing on 200+ ping, effectively creating 4v5 scenarios where one member of a team is too laggy to play properly making OCE's experience worse, realise that they get worse ping here than whinge that they want to go back to NA. 

I guarantee you that within a week of it ending there will be numerous threads complaining they want to go back. And when they dont want to pay for 2600RP to go back they will either %%%%% and moan or stop playing altogether. Riots gonna say tuff shid and then there is going to be a whole demographic of toxic NA players who cannot play the game and will end up feeding/trolling/flaming/all the stuff bronze players say they experience, because they were to stupid to realise that OCE would give them more lag. 

I {{champion:86}}tee it.

I highly doubt people are stupid enough to think that being an American player and transferring to OCE will make their ping any better (if it was bad in the first place in NA). Even if you make that joke that Americans are 'stupid' I highly doubt Riot was aiming to bring American players with bad ping to go to OCE (American players being players located in America, not just simply players playing on NA).

It's probably aimed more towards Australian players who didn't transfer the first time when it was free as well as catering for newer players who maybe didn't know about the OCE transfer or accidentally registered their new accounts within the past year for NA, not OCE. 

Overall, Riot simply just wants to populate the server more as we do suffer from queue problems.

> [{quoted}](name=Aegis,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=EPlpQ1m5,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-16T05:54:57.590+0000)
>
> I highly doubt people are stupid enough to think that being an American player and transferring to OCE will make their ping any better (if it was bad in the first place in NA). 

This is exactly what happend when OCE came out.
No what happened was the idiots transferred to OCE so they could get the "free" Ziggs skin.

dude its for the aussie that didn't wont to play on a beta server but don't wont to pay for a transfer (the smart ones to many issues with the server when it came out). And you my good sir are the reason i wont back to NA 200 ping over f wits like you any day

So it's only from NA to OCE, not the other way around?
And if I do transfer an NA account will I be able to return to NA for free?
Returns to NA are your responsibility (meaning your wallet suffers)
Well I'm just happy i can finally bring my smurfs back home to daddy :D

Do not - I REPEAT - DO NOT transfer from NA to Oceania!

I have transfered from NA to Oceania myself back when it went live. Oceania does not only miss players, it misses game modes and entire features like Refer-a-friend that other servers have.

Lately the connection seems to have gotten dramatically worse as well. I've been getting constant disconnects the last weeks that I've been playing. I got 2 low priority queues for these ridiculous network issues already.

There is literally zero reasons for anyone to join over from NA to Oceania. It's like a dead wasteland over here. Even if your ping might be better over here you will still regret it deeply to have come here i can already tell you now.
I'm waiting for the next best option to get the hell out of here again with this account without having to pay a handful worth of skins just for a transfer, doesn't matter which server to. No server can be worse than Oceania.
On Latin America they got an active community there and it's not just annoying Brazilians as one might expect. Even Northeast EU and Turkey servers are far superior to this one in every aspect, which is ridiculous in the case of the Turkey server since it's newer than the Oceania one.

Just take this as a friendly tip from a fellow gamer, Oceania server is the worst of places to be in to play League of Legends. And I say that as someone who enjoys playing on almost all of the servers.

I don't regret it, in fact i love it here. Also i don't think you read up on current events about how riot is working at their hardest to fix everything they can. And the reason why we are missing game modes is because people like you are telling people to stay and not transfer, which means no people = no gamemodes.

It's also not the worst server and place to play league in
do u get free zigg and pool party skin that my firned told me from na to oce

The Ziggs skin was specifically for early transfers when we launched the server. 

>  Early transfers earn exclusive rewards including Ziggs and Pool Party Ziggs 
[Source](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/league-legends-lands-oceania)

WOW…. so called can refund if you bought one a couple of weeks ago just wow such lie right there. i talked to support said if i used up my 3 tokens already I'm out of luck might as well take off the talk to support if you bought one just recently bought a transfer because i did and they told me And to the player support might as well talk to (The Queen Of The Blades) she/He clearly does not know about this ….. sorry i had to put it on and go on and on about it but I'm pissed off that i bought a transfer over to oce about a week and a half ago and its now free said i can get a refund if i talk to player support and then get told no because my account is only limited to 3, 1 time use tokens only

Send a ticket to Riot, I'm sure if you purchased the transfer before the free transfer was announced they would be happy to refund it. The same thing happens if you buy a skin a week or so before it goes on sale, send a ticket and you get the difference in RP back (that is, the original price minus the price you paid = the amount you get in return)

lucky for you i just got a sorry cannot help you then ignore me when i ask why :

Hi again,

I chased it up but when I mentioned that I'd sort it out for you I misread your previous post where you said you that  you were a few days off of transfer refund period.
You transferred a week before the refund period starts so regrettably we won't be able provide a refund. The two weeks prior to the announcement itself is the grace period and we can't stretch that any further.

That being said, your reply from support was not very informative and I will be chasing it up.

As in did a significant number of people transfer?

I made an NA account a while back to play with some friends, this account ended up being my main account since I had so much fun playing in NA with them, and I was wondering about something.
Given that the transfers to OCE are currently free, I thought I should swap my main and minor accounts regions while its at the cheapest.
But the main thing that worried me is that I would lose summoners icons and or seasonal rewards for events that didn't take place in OCE and vice versa for NA with my other OCE account.
if anyone could shine some light on this as to whether id lose these, please let me know.

I did look at the http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-transfer-faq however it didnt seem to specify any details about server specific event rewards, rather just rewards that are available on all servers. 
please help me ;-;
Well I tried to transfer my NA account over to OCE, and an error popped up and saying that I should contact Riot. halp pls
i accidently clicked that... I cant change back to my original region NA. is there anyway to do that without spending rp?
